mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl(mem_id, mem_name, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_addr_d, mem_phone) values(#{mem_id}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_zipcode}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_addr_d}, #{mem_phone})
mapper.select: select mem_id from member_tbl where mem_id = #{mem_id}
select mem_id, mem_name, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_addr_d, mem_phone, mem_regdate, mem_modifydate from member_tbl where mem_id = #{mem_id}
select mem_id, mem_name, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_addr_d, mem_phone, mem_regdate, mem_modifydate from member_tbl where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_email = #{mem_email}
mapper.update: update member_tbl set mem_pw = #{mem_pw} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.delete: delete from member_tbl where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}
